description: Change of use of the ground floor premises from office (Use Class E) to residential (Use Class C3) to provide four self-contained units.
decision_conditions: <p><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;">By reason of the inadequate provision of cycle parking provision, with the proposed development resulting in a loss of existing visitor cycle parking provision, the proposed development would undermine policy objectives to promote sustainable modes of transport. The proposed development would, therefore, be contrary to Policy LP42 of the Hackney Local Plan 2033 (2020).</span></p>

<p><span id="docs-internal-guid-e60c2b07-7fff-50d9-1444-c309963e9da4"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; font-variant-emoji: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">In the absence of a legal agreement securing the financial contribution towards carbon off-setting has not been submitted or completed, the proposal would therefore fail to secure sufficient energy efficiency measures and/or financial contribution towards carbon offsetting, the proposed development would result in an unacceptable level of carbon dioxide emissions, contrary to Policy LP55 of the Hackney Local Plan 2033 (2020).</span></span></p>

<p><span id="docs-internal-guid-d770d56c-7fff-b9f2-79f8-246b07e62759"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; font-variant-emoji: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">In the absence of a Unilateral Undertaking or a Section 106 agreement securing appropriate mitigation by restricting future occupiers of the development from obtaining parking permits within the Controlled Parking Zone the proposed development would likely exacerbate existing parking stress and congestion on the surrounding highway network. The application is, therefore, contrary to Policy LP45 of the Hackney Local Plan 2033 (2020) and Policy T6 of the London Plan (2021).</span></span></p>

<p>By reason of the exposed location of glazing, presenting onto Leagrave Street and Chatsworth Road, the proposed development would fail to safeguard the privacy levels of future occupiers of Flats 0.01, 0.02 and 0.04. Furthermore, by reason of the single aspect accommodation proposed for Flat 0.03, with the outlook likely to create an oppressive internal environment, this unit would fail to provide substandard accommodation. The proposed development would, therefore, be detrimental to the living conditions of future occupiers contrary to Policy D6 of the London Plan (2021) and Policies LP2 and LP17 of the Hackney Local Plan 2033 (2020).</p>

<p><span id="docs-internal-guid-c8406edb-7fff-9e50-e34c-4faceb3518b1"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; font-variant-emoji: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">By reason of the proposed development resulting in the loss of office and / or retail floorspace, which has failed to have been justified through the provision of robust and adequate marketing evidence demonstrating that there is no demand for the floorspace, the proposed development would, therefore, conflict with the objectives of Policies LP27 &amp; LP36 of the Hackney Local Plan 2033 (2020) which seeks to promote and protect office and retail floorspace.</span></span></p>

<p><span id="docs-internal-guid-951c237e-7fff-336a-d999-acebc2e57cb3"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; font-variant-emoji: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">By reason of a lack of provision of affordable housing, the proposed development would fail to adequately contribute towards the provision of mixed and balanced communities and housing needs in the local area. As such, the development would not be consistent with Policies H4 and H5 of the London Plan (2021), Policies LP12 and LP13 of the Hackney Local Plan 2033 (2020), and the Hackney </span><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; font-variant-emoji: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">S106 Planning Contributions Supplementary Planning Document (2020)</span><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; font-variant-emoji: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">.</span></span></p>
